verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
E
What love could remember
no wrongs we have done
Omniscient all-knowing
He counts not their sum

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Thrown into a sea
without bottom or shore
Our sins they are many
His mercy is more

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord
His mercy is more
Stronger than darkness
new every morn
Our sins they are many
His mercy is more

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
What patience would wait
as we constantly roam
What Father so tender
is calling us home

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He welcomes the weakest
the vilest the poor
Our sins they are many
His mercy is more

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
What riches of kindness
He lavished on us
His blood was the payment
His life was the cost

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
We stood 'neath a debt
we could never afford
Our sins they are many
His mercy is more
